TopicTitle: Please close this Smaller Kerbal system X/10

Articles.Content:
With all the planate mods and larger system mods and RSS mod has anyone stopped to think that perhaps for those who like a more gamey feeling rather than less of one it might be fun to make a 1/10th size system. I am sure there are naysayers but this is just a thought.

Edited April 26, 2015 by mcirish3
Already been done

It's been done. I think there was also a 1/100 config out there too where Kerbin was 12km wide.

...here it is: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95122-1-10-Stock-System-Config-for-RSS

It's been done. I think there was also a 1/100 config out there too where Kerbin was 12km wide.

...here it is: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95122-1-10-Stock-System-Config-for-RSS

12km. That sounds right.
